about_the_game:
The clothing of the sacrificial temple for the young Meng includes the clothing of the sacrificial temple for the young Meng
Seize the opportunity, watch the ladle at midnight. ※.
Sacrifice ceremony held in ancient villages and sacrificial clothing that must be worn by the sacrificial person. ※.
A straight coat with two side seams and pure white silk material indicates cleanness and solemnity. ※.
Gift of 29999 Lingbi with clothing.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
